intro.description: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of defining and assigning roles and organizations.

item.title: Creating a Role
item.description:
Create the role for Callcenter Agent:
1. In the diagram toolbar palette select Participants > Role.
2. Place the role symbol on the diagram canvas.
3. Double-click to open the properties dialog.
4. Change the name to "Callcenter Agent"
5. OK the dialog.

item.title: Assigning a Role to an Activity
item.description:
To assign the role of the Callcenter Agent to the Create Case:
1. In the diagram toolbar palette select Connect.
2. Click the symbol representing the role.
3. Click the symbol representing the activity Create Case.
In the same way create another role with name "Engineer" and assign it to the activity Analyze To Solve.

item.title: Creating an Organization
item.description:
Create a new organization:
1. Double-click the Default Diagram of the "ACME Workflow Model" model.
2. In the diagram toolbar palette select Participants > Organization.
3. Double-click the newly created organization symbol.
4. In the properties dialog name the organization "ACME Headquarters".
5. Place the new organization in the Participant Diagram.

item.title: Assigning a Role to an Organization
item.description:
To assign the role Engineer to the headquarters organization:
1. Select the role Engineer and place it to the Participant Diagram. 2. In the diagram toolbar palette select Connect.
3. Click the symbol of the Engineer.
4. Subsequently, click the ACME Headquarters organization symbol.
5. Select Works For to make the engineer a member of the organization ACME Headquarters.

item.title: Assigning a Teamleader to an Organization
item.description:
To assign the roles to the headquarters organization:
1. Select the participant Callcenter Agent and place it to the Participant Diagram. 2. In the diagram toolbar palette select Connect.
3. Click the symbol of the Callcenter Agent.
4. Subsequently, click the ACME Headquarters organization symbol.
5. Select Manager Of to make the Callcenter Agent the teamleader.

item.title: Assigning the Organization to an Activity
item.description:
Now switch to the Support Case Management Process default diagram and assign the remaining activity Deliver Patch to the newly created organization:
1. Double-click the Default diagram of the Support Management Process.
2. Drag the ACME Headquarters symbol to the process diagram.
3. Select Connect in the diagram toolbar palette.
4. Click the symbol representing the organization.
5. Click the symbol representing the Deliver Patch activity.
